title: Azhage Azhage Album Song Lyrics
stanzas:
<div>
Azhage Azhage En Azhage Lyrics Album

yendi unna naan
love pannuren
yendi unpina
naayaa suthuren

yendi unna naan
naalum nenaikkuren
adi yendi
adi yendi adiyee

unna pola ponna indha
paarthathilla
enda manasa kollaikonda
ponnu vera yaarumilla

azhagae azhagae
en azhagae
nilave nilave
muzhu nilave (2)

kanavil vandha penne
neeye neethaanaa
unnai serum munne
uyir pirivenaa

nenjaakuli orathula
nee irundhaa podhumpilla
nee mattum podhumpilla
vera yaarum thevayilla

nee podhum
paadhai adhula
naan varuven
nizhala pola
oru vaarthai
neeyum kooradi

kanavil vandha penne
neeye neethaanaa
unnai serum munne
uyir pirivenaa

azhagae unna
piriyamaaten
unna pirinju
vaazhamaatten

adhu sorgam endraalum
naragam endraalum
koodave varuven

unodu sera kooda vazha
usura kooda viduven

azhagae azhagae
en azhagae
nilave nilave
muzhu nilave (2)
